messages: The best boyfriend isn't the best-looking, the funniest, or the richest. It's the one that makes sure you know he loves you.
RT @TheWorldStories: Lightning strikes over London's iconic Tower Bridge, creating an exhilarating scene. http://t.co/asuNFXAVJz
